blocks.name: cntmeas
blocks.content: The Counting measure is a measure on any sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cntmeas(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cres(chash, c0), cfv(cmeas, c0)))
} = {
  mpbir3and(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cres(chash, c0), cfv(cmeas, c0)), wf(cres(chash, c0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), emptycls), nat0), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wf(cres(chash, c0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  mp2an(wf(cres(chash, c0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(chash, universe, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(c0, universe))
  hashf2()
  ssv(c0)
  fssres(chash, universe, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c0)
  syl6eq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), emptycls), nat0, cfv(chash, emptycls), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), emptycls), cfv(chash, emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  0elsiga(c0)
  fvres(emptycls, c0, chash)
  hash0()
  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1))))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1)))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(chash, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(chash, cv(hs1)))))
  mpan(wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(chash, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  hasheuni(hs1, cv(hs0), universe)
  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  r19.21bi(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  simp3d(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  simprd(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), w3a(wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))), wss(c0, cpw(cuni(c0))))
  isrnsigau(hs0, c0)
  ralimi(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0))))))
  imim2i(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  fvres(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0, chash)
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(chash, cv(hs1)))))
  esumeq2dv(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  imp(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(chash, cv(hs1))))
  syl6(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(chash, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  sseld(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), c0)
  fvres(cv(hs1), c0, chash)
  ismeas(hs0, hs1, c0, cres(chash, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(chash, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(chash, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cntmeas(class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)â†’(# |` c0)âˆˆ(measures ` c0))
} = {
  mpbir3and(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), (# |` c0)âˆˆ(measures ` c0), ((# |` c0): c0 â†’(0[[,]]+âˆ)), ((# |` c0)` âˆ…)= 0, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),((hs0[â‰¼]_om âˆ§ âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1))â†’((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)= sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1)))))
  a1i(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), ((# |` c0): c0 â†’(0[[,]]+âˆ)))
  mp2an(((# |` c0): c0 â†’(0[[,]]+âˆ)), (# : ğ•Œ â†’(0[[,]]+âˆ)), c0 âŠ† ğ•Œ)
  hashf2()
  ssv(c0)
  fssres(chash, universe, (0[[,]]+âˆ), c0)
  syl6eq(((# |` c0)` âˆ…), nat0, (# ` âˆ…), c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra))
  syl(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), ((# |` c0)` âˆ…)=(# ` âˆ…), âˆ… âˆˆ c0)
  0elsiga(c0)
  fvres(emptycls, c0, chash)
  hash0()
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(c0), c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), ((hs0[â‰¼]_om âˆ§ âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1))â†’((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)= sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1))))
  ex((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ P(c0)), (hs0[â‰¼]_om âˆ§ âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1)), ((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)= sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1)))
  3eqtr4d(((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0), sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1)), (# ` â‹ƒ hs0), sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,(# ` hs1)), ((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ P(c0))âˆ§(hs0[â‰¼]_om âˆ§ âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1))))
  ad2antll((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ P(c0)), hs0[â‰¼]_om, âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1), (# ` â‹ƒ hs0)= sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,(# ` hs1)))
  mpan(âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1), (# ` â‹ƒ hs0)= sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,(# ` hs1)), hs0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(hs0)
  hasheuni(hs1, hs0, universe)
  adantrr((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ P(c0)), hs0[â‰¼]_om, âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1), ((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)=(# ` â‹ƒ hs0))
  imp((c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ P(c0)), hs0[â‰¼]_om, ((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)=(# ` â‹ƒ hs0))
  r19.21bi(hs0, P(c0), c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), (hs0[â‰¼]_om â†’((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)=(# ` â‹ƒ hs0)))
  syl(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),(hs0[â‰¼]_om â†’((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)=(# ` â‹ƒ hs0))), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),(hs0[â‰¼]_om â†’ â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0)))
  simp3d(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),(hs0[â‰¼]_om â†’ â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0)), â‹ƒ c0 âˆˆ c0, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ c0 \ hs0)âˆˆ c0))
  simprd(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), (â‹ƒ c0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ c0 \ hs0)âˆˆ c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),(hs0[â‰¼]_om â†’ â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0))), c0 âŠ† P(â‹ƒ c0))
  isrnsigau(hs0, c0)
  ralimi(hs0, P(c0), (hs0[â‰¼]_om â†’ â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0), (hs0[â‰¼]_om â†’((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)=(# ` â‹ƒ hs0)))
  imim2i(hs0[â‰¼]_om, â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c0, ((# |` c0)` â‹ƒ hs0)=(# ` â‹ƒ hs0))
  fvres(â‹ƒ hs0, c0, chash)
  ad2antlr(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra), hs0 âˆˆ P(c0), (hs0[â‰¼]_om âˆ§ âŠ”(hs1 âˆˆ hs0, hs1)), sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1))= sum*(hs1 âˆˆ hs0,(# ` hs1)))
  esumeq2dv(hs1, hs0, ((# |` c0)` hs1), (# ` hs1), hs0 âˆˆ P(c0))
  imp(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0), hs1 âˆˆ hs0, ((# |` c0)` hs1)=(# ` hs1))
  syl6(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0), hs1 âˆˆ hs0, ((# |` c0)` hs1)=(# ` hs1), hs1 âˆˆ c0)
  sseld(hs1, hs0, c0, hs0 âˆˆ P(c0))
  elpwi(hs0, c0)
  fvres(hs1, c0, chash)
  ismeas(hs0, hs1, c0, (# |` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 âˆˆ â‹ƒ ran(sigAlgebra))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((# |` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((# |` c0))
}

blocks.name: pwcntmeas
blocks.content: The counting measure is a measure on any power set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: cntnevol
blocks.content: Counting and Lebesgue measures are different. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cntnevol(class c0) {
  |- wne(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wne(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol), wcel(nat1, c0))
  syl(wcel(nat1, c0), wne(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol), wne(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), csn(nat1)), cfv(cvol, csn(nat1))))
  3netr4d(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), csn(nat1)), cfv(cvol, csn(nat1)), nat1, nat0, wcel(nat1, c0))
  a1i(wcel(nat1, c0), wne(nat1, nat0))
  ax-1ne0()
  syl6eq(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), csn(nat1)), nat1, cfv(chash, csn(nat1)), wcel(nat1, c0))
  syl(wcel(nat1, c0), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), csn(nat1)), cfv(chash, csn(nat1))), wcel(csn(nat1), cpw(c0)))
  snelpwi(nat1, c0)
  fvres(csn(nat1), cpw(c0), chash)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(nat1)), nat1), wcel(nat1, cr))
  hashsng(nat1, cr)
  a1i(wcel(nat1, c0), wceq(cfv(cvol, csn(nat1)), nat0))
  mp2b(wceq(cfv(cvol, csn(nat1)), nat0), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)))
  syl6eq(cfv(cvol, csn(nat1)), nat0, cfv(covol, csn(nat1)), wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)))
  mblvol(csn(nat1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(covol, csn(nat1)), nat0), wcel(nat1, cr))
  necon3i(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), csn(nat1)), cfv(cvol, csn(nat1)), cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol)
  fveq1(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol, csn(nat1))
  syl(wn(wcel(nat1, c0)), wne(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol), wne(cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))), cdm(cvol)))
  necomd(cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))), cdm(cvol), wn(wcel(nat1, c0)))
  sylbir(wn(wcel(nat1, c0)), wne(cdm(cvol), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0)))), wa(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)), wn(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0)))))))
  bitr3i(wa(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)), wn(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0)))))), wn(wcel(nat1, c0)), wn(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))))))
  biantrur(wn(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))))), wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)))
  ax-mp(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  syl2anc(wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)), wss(csn(nat1), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, csn(nat1)), nat0))
  snssi(nat1, cr)
  ovolsn(nat1)
  nulmbl(csn(nat1))
  notbii(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0)))), wcel(nat1, c0))
  3bitr4i(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0)))), wcel(nat1, c0), wcel(csn(nat1), cpw(c0)), wss(csn(nat1), c0))
  elpw(csn(nat1), c0)
  snex(nat1)
  eleq2i(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))), cpw(c0))
  dmhashres(cpw(c0))
  snss(nat1, c0)
  1ex()
  nelne1(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))))
  necon3i(cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))), cdm(cvol), cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol)
  dmeq(cres(chash, cpw(c0)), cvol)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cntnevol(class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (# |` P(c0))â‰  vol
} = {
  pm2.61i((# |` P(c0))â‰  vol, 1 âˆˆ c0)
  syl(1 âˆˆ c0, (# |` P(c0))â‰  vol, ((# |` P(c0))` { 1 })â‰ (vol ` { 1 }))
  3netr4d(((# |` P(c0))` { 1 }), (vol ` { 1 }), nat1, nat0, 1 âˆˆ c0)
  a1i(1 âˆˆ c0, 1 â‰  0)
  ax-1ne0()
  syl6eq(((# |` P(c0))` { 1 }), nat1, (# ` { 1 }), 1 âˆˆ c0)
  syl(1 âˆˆ c0, ((# |` P(c0))` { 1 })=(# ` { 1 }), { 1 } âˆˆ P(c0))
  snelpwi(nat1, c0)
  fvres({ 1 }, P(c0), chash)
  ax-mp((# ` { 1 })= 1, 1 âˆˆ â„)
  hashsng(nat1, cr)
  a1i(1 âˆˆ c0, (vol ` { 1 })= 0)
  mp2b((vol ` { 1 })= 0, 1 âˆˆ â„, { 1 } âˆˆ dom(vol))
  syl6eq((vol ` { 1 }), nat0, (vol* ` { 1 }), { 1 } âˆˆ dom(vol))
  mblvol({ 1 })
  ax-mp((vol* ` { 1 })= 0, 1 âˆˆ â„)
  necon3i(((# |` P(c0))` { 1 }), (vol ` { 1 }), (# |` P(c0)), cvol)
  fveq1((# |` P(c0)), cvol, { 1 })
  syl(Â¬ 1 âˆˆ c0, (# |` P(c0))â‰  vol, dom((# |` P(c0)))â‰  dom(vol))
  necomd(dom((# |` P(c0))), dom(vol), Â¬ 1 âˆˆ c0)
  sylbir(Â¬ 1 âˆˆ c0, dom(vol)â‰  dom((# |` P(c0))), ({ 1 } âˆˆ dom(vol)âˆ§ Â¬ { 1 } âˆˆ dom((# |` P(c0)))))
  bitr3i(({ 1 } âˆˆ dom(vol)âˆ§ Â¬ { 1 } âˆˆ dom((# |` P(c0)))), Â¬ 1 âˆˆ c0, Â¬ { 1 } âˆˆ dom((# |` P(c0))))
  biantrur(Â¬ { 1 } âˆˆ dom((# |` P(c0))), { 1 } âˆˆ dom(vol))
  ax-mp({ 1 } âˆˆ dom(vol), 1 âˆˆ â„)
  1re()
  syl2anc(1 âˆˆ â„, { 1 } âˆˆ dom(vol), { 1 } âŠ† â„, (vol* ` { 1 })= 0)
  snssi(nat1, cr)
  ovolsn(nat1)
  nulmbl({ 1 })
  notbii({ 1 } âˆˆ dom((# |` P(c0))), 1 âˆˆ c0)
  3bitr4i({ 1 } âˆˆ dom((# |` P(c0))), 1 âˆˆ c0, { 1 } âˆˆ P(c0), { 1 } âŠ† c0)
  elpw({ 1 }, c0)
  snex(nat1)
  eleq2i({ 1 }, dom((# |` P(c0))), P(c0))
  dmhashres(P(c0))
  snss(nat1, c0)
  1ex()
  nelne1({ 1 }, dom(vol), dom((# |` P(c0))))
  necon3i(dom((# |` P(c0))), dom(vol), (# |` P(c0)), cvol)
  dmeq((# |` P(c0)), cvol)
}
